title: Site Migration to Astro
changes: Migrated entire site from legacy single-page HTML (Bootstrap 3 / jQuery 1.x) to Astro 4.x static site generator
Upgraded from Font Awesome 4 to Font Awesome 6 Free (CDN)
Removed jQuery dependency — all interactivity now uses vanilla JavaScript
Extracted all hardcoded content into 10 JSON data files for easy editing
Built 13 reusable Astro components from the monolithic index.html
Replaced deprecated Google Universal Analytics with Google Analytics 4 (GA4)
Added Bootstrap 5 accordion for Chapter Updates (current year open by default)
Added Bootstrap 5 accordion for Meeting Recap news articles
Constrained oversized images with max-width limits throughout the site
Set Google Calendar embed to half-width layout alongside events
Deployed to Azure Static Web Apps (Free tier) with GitHub Actions CI/CD
Created automated build and deploy pipeline — push to master triggers deployment
